translation.en: [man] Dear Office of Admissions,
my name is Brooks Rattigan,
but I don't just want you to know that,
I want the world to know that,
because I wanna change the world.
Like my heroes before me,
Jobs, Jordan,
Musk, game changers.
World changers.
These are big lives,
glamorous lives.
My dad lived a pretty big life.
translation.zh: ‎我爸以前的生活也很有影响力

translation.en: Now he...
doesn't.
You can't change the world alone.
Every Jobs needs a Watts, every Jordan has a Pippen,
translation.zh:
‎每个乔布斯都需要一个沃茨
‎每个乔丹背后都有一个皮蓬

translation.en: every Musk has...
Well, actually I think
Musk will probably end up on Mars by himself.
I've got Murph.
[chuckles] The reviews are in.
-And? -Someone wrote...
Oh, "This app made me poke my eyes out, thanks for nothing."
translation.zh:
‎“这个软件把我眼睛都刺瞎了
‎真是没用”

translation.en: But someone else wrote, "Groovy app," so...
translation.zh: ‎但还有人说“绝妙的软件” 所以…

translation.en: I guess it's net neutral.
-It's good that they're not all bad. -True.
translation.zh:
‎-不全是差评 这是件好事
‎-是的

translation.en: On to the next one.
[Brooks] Another crucial lesson I've learned from my heroes and from Murph,
translation.zh:
‎我从墨菲和我的英雄们学到的
‎另一个重要的教训是

translation.en: "Always be improving."
I invoke this lesson daily in my current profession...
translation.zh:
‎我每天这样激励自己
‎我目前的职位是

translation.en: purveyor of the culinary arts.
Without vision, we succumb to the average, and what I want is the extraordinary
translation.zh:
‎如果没有目标 我们只能甘居平凡
‎而我想要的是不平凡

translation.en: and the support of an extraordinary unive--
translation.zh: ‎有一个不平凡的大学的支持…

translation.en: Okay. That's enough.
-But there's actually five more pages. -That's plenty.
Okay.
So what do you think?
I think...
I think all the words were there.
You hate it.
I bare my soul on these pages and you hate my soul.
translation.zh:
‎我把我的灵魂写进去了
‎你不喜欢我的灵魂

translation.en: You didn't bare your soul. That's what I hate about it.
translation.zh:
‎你没有把你的灵魂体现出来
‎这是我不喜欢的

translation.en: -Say more about that. -You wanna change the world?
What about it?
The world needs changing and I'm sure that you can agree with that.
translation.zh:
‎这世界需要改变
‎我相信你可以赞同这一点

translation.en: You talk about creating the next big thing. What thing?
translation.zh: ‎你说你要创造大发明 什么发明？

translation.en: And you wanna be a game-changer.
translation.zh: ‎你想成为一个游戏规则改变者？

translation.en: What is the game?
You're really going full-blown Shark Tank on me,
and I have to say that I appreciate it.
-Yale's the goal, correct? -Yes, more than anything in the world.
translation.zh:
‎-你想进耶鲁大学 是吗？
‎-是的 我做梦都想

translation.en: You have the grades.
Thank you for noticing.
They're not just looking for good grades.
If you wanna stand out, you're gonna have to rework your essay.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想脱颖而出
‎你得重写你的文章

translation.en: You're gonna have to look real deep inside
and ask yourself,
"Who is Brooks Rattigan?"
[man] Wanna take it for a spin, Rattigan?
-Uh, yeah, sure. -Yeah?
No. No!
Hey, he's home.
Good thing I got a second box here.
No, I think I'm just gonna grab something from work.
Wait, wait, wait. No, no, no. Don't go.
I feel like we don't talk anymore.
Really? I feel like that's pretty much all we do.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？我觉得那是我们唯一做的事

translation.en: You met with the counselor today, right? How did that go?
translation.zh:
‎你今天见了辅导员 对吗？
‎你们聊得怎么样？

translation.en: It was good. She told me that Yale's competitive. Did you know that?
translation.zh:
‎挺好的 她告诉我耶鲁的竞争很激烈
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: I thought we agreed on UCONN?
translation.zh: ‎不是说好你上康涅狄格大学吗？

translation.en: Faculty scions only pay room and board.
translation.zh: ‎教工子女只需要付住宿的钱

translation.en: Dad, I told you not to worry about the money.
translation.zh: ‎爸 我和你说过 不要担心钱的问题

translation.en: Okay, you're right. Why am I worried about money?
translation.zh:
‎你说得对 ‎我干嘛要担心钱？
‎大学是免费的 不是吗？

translation.en: College is free, right?
translation.zh:
‎我干嘛要担心钱？
‎大学是免费的 不是吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna figure it out.
[sighs] I don't get it.
It's a great school.
UCONN is like the girl down the street who eats food in bed and smells like it.
translation.zh:
‎爸 康大就像我们街上的那个女孩 ‎在床上吃东西
‎身上都是食物的味道

translation.en: -Patty Munchwrath? -I love Patty, she's fantastic,
translation.zh:
‎-吃货佩蒂？
‎-我喜欢佩蒂 她很棒

translation.en: but she's not Yale.
Yale...
She is...
she's smart,
she's stylish, but not flashy.
She's cultured, she speaks multiple languages, probably knows how to sail.
translation.zh:
‎她有文化 会说多种语言
‎可能还会驾驶帆船

translation.en: You get accepted by her,
that means you're somebody special.
translation.zh: ‎那就意味着你是一个特别的人

translation.en: Murph, do you wanna write my admissions essay for me?
translation.zh:
‎墨菲
‎你想帮我写申请学校的文章吗？

translation.en: We could do it like a thought exercise.
I'm good, cos I'm writing mine, because people write their own.
translation.zh:
‎不要 我有我自己的要写
‎应该是各人写各人的

translation.en: Give me some inspiration. What's your core theme?
translation.zh: ‎给我点启发 你的主题是什么？

translation.en: I'm writing about my struggles with dyslexia,
and I'm writing it backwards.
That's genius.
-Do you wanna hear what I got? -Mm.
"My name is Brooks Rattigan."
I like it.
It's raw.
Honest.
I don't know, man, I think my life's interesting.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我的生活挺有意思的
‎我只是不知道怎么…

translation.en: I just don't know how to articulate it, you know?
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我的生活挺有意思的
‎我只是不知道怎么… ‎去表达它 你懂吗？

translation.en: Why don't you write about your mom leaving?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不写你妈妈的离开呢？

translation.en: -That's interesting. -That's a really short essay, actually.
translation.zh:
‎-会很有意思
‎-这篇文章不适合长篇大论

translation.en: Dad got bucked off the publishing horse instead of getting back on it,
translation.zh:
‎我爸被出版社炒了
‎他本来可以要回工作

translation.en: and chasing after his cowgirl,
he decided that sitting in the mud was good enough for him.
Yeah, but she left you too.
No, I think in truth she left this town, and I can't hold that against her.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得事实是她离开了这个镇…
‎我不能怪她

translation.en: Nothing is good enough for you.
I think I can respect that.
[man] My aunt and uncle keep begging me, and it's like I'm not gonna say, "No."
translation.zh:
‎…我的叔叔婶婶不停地求我
‎我不能拒绝他们

translation.en: You say, "No," because she's family and dating your cousin is weird.
translation.zh:
‎正因为她是你家人 你才要拒绝
‎和你表妹约会很奇怪的

translation.en: Dude, I'm not dating my cousin,
translation.zh: ‎我不是和我表妹约会 我只是陪她

translation.en: I'm escorting her to a semi-formal like Greenwich Prep, that's it.
translation.zh: ‎我不是和我表妹约会 我只是陪她 ‎去格林威治学校舞会 没别的

translation.en: Plus my uncle is paying me too, so...
What up, Rattigan? Italian sub on wheat, no tomatoes.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 拉蒂根 来一个意式三明治
‎小麦面包 不加番茄

translation.en: Italian sub for the Italian guy.
I'm Swedish.
No, yeah, I know,
just no self-respecting Italian would turn his back on the tomato.
translation.zh: ‎有自尊的意大利人不会拒绝番茄

translation.en: Word.
Anyway, I mean, dude, it's like the worst timing ever too.
Like, Maddison's parents are gonna be gone
translation.zh: ‎麦迪森的父母当天晚上不在家

translation.en: for the night and we'd have the house to ourselves.
Is your cousin hot? I'll take her if she's hot.
translation.zh: ‎你表妹漂亮吗？如果她漂亮我就陪她

translation.en: I'll take your cousin.
-What? -Yeah, what?
Yeah, what?
-I'll take your cousin to the dance. -Oh, yeah, sandwich boy?
translation.zh:
‎-我送你表妹去舞会
‎-是吗 三明治男孩？

translation.en: Yeah? You gonna be wearing those plastic gloves too?
translation.zh: ‎你会戴着那副塑料手套去吗？

translation.en: Cos my aunt would love that.
No, this is Greenwich, so I would dress the part.
translation.zh:
‎不会 这是去格林威治
‎我会穿得像样的

translation.en: -Why? What would you get out of it? -I get the payment you're talking about.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？这样对你有什么好？
‎-我可以拿到你刚才说的那笔钱…

translation.en: -And I get to take your car. -[laughs]
No, you're not taking my car.
Come on, man, you're gonna tell me that you really wanna give up the chance
translation.zh:
‎别这样 你真想放弃
‎麦迪森父母不在时

translation.en: of spending an entire night all alone with Maddison when her parents are out of town?
You got a suit?
Woo! I cannot believe he said yes, Murph. This is incredible!
translation.zh:
‎我真不敢相信他同意了 墨菲
‎这太不可思议了

translation.en: It's just a car.
translation.zh:
‎-只是辆车而已
‎-你一点也不懂欣赏生活中

translation.en: You have no appreciation for the finer things in life.
translation.zh:
‎-只是辆车而已
‎-你一点也不懂欣赏生活中 ‎-美好的事物
‎-说到我不欣赏的事物

translation.en: Speaking of things
translation.zh:
‎-美好的事物
‎-说到我不欣赏的事物

translation.en: I don't have appreciation for, remind me again,
why you agreed to do this? Because I need the money.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么要同意这样做？
‎-因为我需要钱

translation.en: Who knows, maybe stepping outside of myself,
translation.zh: ‎谁知道 或许做些和平时不一样的事

translation.en: becoming someone else for the night, it might help me finish my essay.
translation.zh:
‎今晚变成另一个人或许可以帮助我
‎完成我的论文

translation.en: And who are you gonna become?
Whatever she wants me to be, which I'm pretty sure is
what every other girl wants me to be.
translation.zh: ‎应该是每个女孩都想我成为的人

translation.en: Some knight in shining armor,
some Prince Charming to open doors for her and compliment her hair.
translation.zh:
‎一个帮她开门
‎赞美她的头发的白马王子

translation.en: You're getting paid to take a girl on a date.
So, did you know that Michelle Obama got paid to go on a date with Barack
translation.zh:
‎那又怎么样？你知道奥巴马和他
‎妻子以前也有过付费约会吗？

translation.en: -and look how great that turned out. -Is that true?
translation.zh:
‎-看看他们现在结果多好
‎-是真的吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not a presidential historian, but it could be true,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我又不是总统历史学家 ‎但这有可能是真的

translation.en: and that is my point.
-Hello, sir. Brooks Rattigan. -Brooks Rattigan.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 我是布鲁克斯·拉蒂根
‎-布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: Reece told us all about you.
Just your name, but that's all I needed to run the background check.
translation.zh:
‎只要你的名字
‎我做背景调查只需要那么多

translation.en: No, I actually know that you ran a background check.
-I found out when I ran one on you. -[guffaws]
translation.zh: ‎是我在调查你的背景时发现的

translation.en: -Jerry Lieberman. Come in, Brooks. -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-我叫杰瑞·利伯曼 请进 布鲁克斯
‎-好的

translation.en: Before you have a chance to change your mind.
I'm kidding.
I like to joke about things.
-So, welcome to our humble abode. -[young woman] This is stupid!
-As you can see, all original flooring. -[young woman] Get out!
translation.zh:
‎-你可以看到 都是原装地板
‎-出去！

translation.en: I swear, Jerry, the wrinkles that girl has caused me
translation.zh: ‎天哪 杰瑞 那丫头让我

translation.en: in places I didn't even know could wrinkle.
Honey, our guest has arrived.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我们的客人到了

translation.en: Hi.
Brooks Rattigan.
Lillian Lieberman.
She won't wear the shoes.
There are no "the shoes," there's just shoes. Is she wearing shoes?
translation.zh:
‎别管她穿哪双了 只要是双鞋
‎她穿鞋了吗？

translation.en: [Jerry] It's a miracle she agreed to do this.
Good evening.
-I am-- -Reece's bitch?
-Celia! -Relax, he knows I'm kidding.
translation.zh:
‎-西利亚！
‎-别紧张 他知道我在开玩笑

translation.en: Right, slum?
Oh, sweetie, you look so beautiful.
I'm not wearing the shoes.
-But they go. -Listen to yourself.
Well, I happen to think that heels are an outmoded display of
translation.zh: ‎我觉得高跟鞋是一个过时的…

translation.en: female oppression.
Fine.
Thanks, Mom.
Let's do this, so we can stop doing this.
translation.zh: ‎我们走吧 这样可以早点结束

translation.en: [Jerry] You kids have fun.
-Thanks for the assist back there. -Yeah, no, just part of the job.
translation.zh:
‎-刚才谢谢你帮我
‎-没事 只是工作的一部分

translation.en: Reece let you use his car.
Man, he was really desperate to get out of this, wasn't he?
translation.zh: ‎他真是非常不想带我 是吧？

translation.en: No, he wanted to go with you. He thought we would have more fun together.
translation.zh:
‎不 他想和你一起去
‎他只是觉得我们在一起会更有意思

translation.en: There you are.
Oh, that's cute,
but I can open my own doors.
Thanks.
Shall I put on some music?
Wow, you provide quite the service.
Don't tell me you've got individually wrapped Mentos
translation.zh:
‎你的手套箱里不会有
‎单独包装的薄荷糖

translation.en: and Tyler water bottles in your glove box.
Oh, my God, you do.
Fulfilling my fantasy of dating my Lyft driver.
translation.zh: ‎和我出租车司机约会的幻想成真了

translation.en: [GPS] In 500 feet, make a left.
No, you're gonna keep on the straight.
-The navigation said-- -No, don't listen to robots, listen to me.
translation.zh:
‎-导航说…
‎-别听机器人的 听我的

translation.en: [GPS] Recalculating. In 200 feet, make a right.
You need to make a left here.
Okay, so now pull over,
and here we are.
This is not your high school.
Wouldn't it be weird if it was?
Okay, so you can swing back and pick me up in a few hours.
translation.zh: ‎好 你可以过几个小时后来接我

translation.en: You're telling me that you would rather hang out at a...
café book store than go to a high school dance?
Yes.
Oh, my God. Yes.
Yes, I would.
-Celia. -Gigolo.
-Brooks. My name's Brooks. -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎我的名字是布鲁克斯 ‎-好吧
‎-听着 我得对你负责

translation.en: Look, you are my responsibility, and I cannot let you out of this car.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-听着 我得对你负责 ‎我不能让你下车

translation.en: Okay, let's define terms here.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那我们把话说清楚了

translation.en: I'm not your responsibility, because Eisenhower isn't in office anymore.
translation.zh:
‎你不用对我负责
‎因为艾森豪威尔已经不是总统了

translation.en: Secondly, you're being paid to hang out with me.
translation.zh: ‎其次 你和我一起玩是有钱拿的

translation.en: Imagine how that makes me feel. Like, really, really imagine it.
translation.zh: ‎想想看 我是什么感受 好好想想

translation.en: Now do as I say.
Compensation aside, I think that you and I could have a really good time tonight.
translation.zh:
‎补偿不谈
‎我认为我们今晚真的可以玩得很开心

translation.en: You've clearly never been to my high school.
Fine.
Wow.
What?
Your hair looks really nice.
-Wow, this is your cafeteria? -Center for culinary participation.
translation.zh:
‎-哇 这是你们的餐厅？
‎-参与烹饪中心

translation.en: Don't let the glossy sheen fool you,
the food still sucks.
I admire your ability to ruin moments. You do it with panache.
translation.zh:
‎我很欣赏你破坏好时刻的能力
‎你做得轻松自如

translation.en: Why is nobody dancing? What, is dancing just a poor person thing now?
translation.zh:
‎为什么没有人跳舞？
‎跳舞现在只是穷人做的事了？

translation.en: You think people actually go to a dance to dance?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得人们参加舞会
‎真的是去跳舞的吗？

translation.en: No, they come here to take photos for their Instagram.
translation.zh: ‎不 他们是来拍照发朋友圈的

translation.en: I'm sure that's why people have babies too.
translation.zh: ‎现在生孩子好像也是为了这个

translation.en: -Okay, let's go shred some hardwood. -No.
-Yes. -No, no, no. -No. -Yes!
Okay.
What do you got going on over here?
I can't tell if you're doing Chandler Bing or Napoleon Dynamite.
translation.zh:
‎我不确定你是在学钱德勒·宾
‎还是大人物拿破仑

translation.en: Definitely Bing.
It's a good choice.
No.
-Come on. -No. -Come on! -No. -Come on. -No, no, no, no!
Bye.
-Oh! Ouch! -Hey! -Are you okay? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 不要！
‎-怎么了 你没事吧？

translation.en: You just made me twist my ankle, you dipshit.
translation.zh: ‎你让我扭了脚 你这个笨蛋

translation.en: Sorry, I was kind of blinded by an angelic light.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我刚才看到了天使的…光芒

translation.en: It's fine, whatever, just now I'm on medical leave.
translation.zh: ‎算了 但现在我要休病假了

translation.en: -Hey, come on, let me help you. -Hey, do not touch me. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 让我帮你
‎-别碰我 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -Yeah.
Are you okay, Celia?
Uh, yeah, I'm fine.
But now I can't run the charity 5K for canine diabetes this weekend.
translation.zh:
‎只是现在不能参加周末的犬类糖尿病
‎慈善运动会了

translation.en: Oh! Funny.
So, I'm having this intimate after-party thing at my place. You guys should come.
translation.zh:
‎我要在我家举办一个密友余兴派对
‎你们也应该来

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, that's...
She's, you know, but rain check?
That's a shame.
-I'm Shelby, by the way. -Brooks.
-Hi. -Hi. [laughs goofily]
Okay.
Well, what do you say there, Brooksie, my boyfriend,
translation.zh: ‎你怎么说？布鲁克斯 我的男朋友

translation.en: my protector, my forever love, shall we get the hell moving?
translation.zh:
‎我的守护者 我的一生所爱
‎我们该闪了吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. It was nice to meet you. -Yeah, you too.
translation.zh:
‎-是的 很高兴认识你
‎-我也是

translation.en: Bye.
[Celia] I mean, a baby in a gas mask?
Oh! Street art is a public disservice.
It's like streaking on a baseball field.
-Trashbug? -Yeah.
I see his stuff everywhere.
I'm pretty sure his next piece is gonna be the Mona Lisa, but with the fangs.
translation.zh:
‎我敢肯定他的下一个作品会是
‎蒙娜丽莎 但会加上尖牙

translation.en: Trashbug, he's just some bored, privileged white dude, I know it.
translation.zh:
‎垃圾虫 他不过是一个无聊的
‎有条件的白人 我敢肯定

translation.en: How you doing, temperature wise? Are you comfortable?
translation.zh: ‎你还好吗？有没有太冷或太热？

translation.en: You're a real professional.
-Like, is this your stock-in-trade? -No.
It should be. I'm telling you, you're really good at it.
translation.zh: ‎应该是 我告诉你 你非常在行

translation.en: Troubled rich girls in need of a chaperone, it could be big business here.
translation.zh:
‎淘气的富女孩需要人陪
‎这可能会是个大生意

translation.en: You really think so?
No, I'm joking. But, wow, you are super serious about it, huh?
translation.zh: ‎不 我在开玩笑 哇 ‎你真的把它当回事了？

translation.en: Okay, you know I could...
I could provide a testimonial for your website.
Celia Lieberman says, "Brooks Rattigan stepped on my ankle,
translation.zh:
‎“西利亚·利伯曼说：
‎‘布鲁克斯·拉蒂根踩了我的脚腕…

translation.en: but...
he got me ice."
Much appreciated, thank you.
Wait, hold on. Let me help you.
You seriously do not have to do that.
Wait, come on. Hold on.
I insist. You shouldn't have to walk to that door by yourself,
especially not with that ankle,
which has miraculously shifted to the other leg.
translation.zh:
‎但你崴的是另一只脚
‎真是个奇迹

translation.en: Huh?
Miracles happen every day.
I had to break into the kitchen to get you packs of ice.
translation.zh: ‎我得闯进厨房去给你拿冰袋

translation.en: -You're a sadist. -One of my more likable qualities.
translation.zh:
‎-你是个虐待狂
‎-那是我讨人喜欢的一点

translation.en: I cannot believe that I missed Shelby's after-party
translation.zh:
‎我真不敢相信
‎因为你这次愚蠢的假扭伤

translation.en: because of your dumb, fake ankle injury.
My fake ankle injury was not dumb.
My fake ankle injury was strategic and adorable.
You should be thanking me. You do not belong at Shelby's party.
translation.zh:
‎你应该向我道谢
‎你不属于谢尔比的派对

translation.en: Oh, really? Poor kid from Bridgeport doesn't belong at a Greenwich after party?
translation.zh:
‎是吗？布里奇波特的穷小子不该去
‎格林威治的余兴派对？

translation.en: Whoa, I didn't even need to try to push that button.
We met, like, four hours ago, remember? I don't know where you're from.
translation.zh:
‎我们四个小时前才认识的 记得吗？
‎我不知道你从哪来

translation.en: I meant you don't belong there, because you seem normal.
translation.zh: ‎我… ‎说你不属于那里 因为你… ‎看上去正常

translation.en: The highest compliment one can receive.
Hey, you're back.
Disappear.
-So, how was the dance? -It was good.
-Oh, thanks for asking. -Right.
Your daughter is a very...
Do not try to define her, Brooks, it will mess up your early 40s.
translation.zh:
‎不要试图定义她 布鲁克斯
‎这会搞砸你的中年人生

translation.en: Well, there's still the matter of the...
The bounty.
Yes.
You know what, take all of it.
-Are you sure? That's a lot of money. -Yeah.
You lasted three hours longer than we predicted.
translation.zh:
‎你坚持的时间比我们想象中超过了
‎三个小时

translation.en: You earned every Benjamin.
translation.zh: ‎这里每一块钱都是你赚来的

translation.en: [Reece] All right, the exterior looks okay.
I mean, you got a couple of smudges right here, but,
it's not too big of a deal.
I don't get it.
Reece, we go to the same school, your parents aren't rich,
translation.zh:
‎里斯 我们上同一所学校
‎你的父母也不富

translation.en: -how did you afford this thing? -Hey, dude...
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么买得起这车的？
‎-嘿 伙计…

translation.en: Dude, some questions shouldn't be asked, okay?
translation.zh: ‎有些问题不该问 知道吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, my bad. -I'm kidding, bro, I'm kidding.
translation.zh:
‎-是的 对不起
‎-我开玩笑呢 兄弟

translation.en: Calm down.
Honestly, it's in the hustle.
It's all in the hustle.
Come on, it is classic quid pro quo.
I get the app I need, and the money I need to go to Yale,
translation.zh: ‎我得到了我需要的软件和上耶鲁的钱

translation.en: and you get to practice your craft, the art of coding.
translation.zh: ‎你可以练习你的技能 编码的艺术

translation.en: -You haven't even been accepted yet. -Yet.
Look, worst case scenario, I take the money,
translation.zh: ‎最坏的结果是 我拿到了钱

translation.en: and I get ownership stake in this here fine establishment.
I can finally live out my eighth-choice dream
translation.zh: ‎我就可以实现我第八个梦想

translation.en: of a being a fast food restaurant owner.
What would you need exactly?
Okay, so I've been thinking and I think
translation.zh: ‎好 我考虑过了 我想

translation.en: that every date would be custom built by the user,
translation.zh: ‎每次约会 客户都可以定制

translation.en: meaning that they could pick my personality, my interests,
translation.zh:
‎就是说他们可以选我的性格
‎我的喜好

translation.en: whether I'm a listener or a talker, if I'm funny or serious.
translation.zh:
‎要我多说还是多听
‎要我好玩一点还是严肃一点

translation.en: Basically, I am a stand-in for whatever it is that they want.
translation.zh:
‎简单来说 我是个替身
‎她们缺什么我就是什么

translation.en: Their dream come true.
If it was successful, that would look good on my college application.
translation.zh:
‎如果成功的话
‎我的入学申请会更好看

translation.en: So does this mean that you're in?
Yes!
I love you so much, Murph.
Wait, what time, what time is it?
-Uh... -Oh, tuna melt on seven grain!
Did you hear a ding?
I think the cheese delivery is here, would you go check?
translation.zh:
‎我想送奶酪的人来了
‎你可以去看一下吗？

translation.en: -I didn't hear a ding. -No, I did, yeah.
-I definitely heard it. Go. Now. -Why are you rushing me, man?
translation.zh:
‎-我肯定听到了 快去
‎-你干嘛催我？

translation.en: Hi.
I'll take a tuna melt on seven grain, please.
translation.zh: ‎我要一份金枪鱼谷物三明治

translation.en: Of course you will.
Is it done?
Have you ever tried to program an app on custom Objective-C infrastructure?
translation.zh:
‎你是否尝试过在自定义Objective-C
‎基础结构上对应用进行编程？

translation.en: You're lucky I was able to salvage some of this code from another project.
translation.zh:
‎幸好我可以从另外一个项目上
‎拿来重复使用一些此类编码

translation.en: Is that it?
It is done.
Murph, this is...
This is perfect.
Uh-huh. In terms of functionality, think GrubHub,
but instead of ordering Pad Thai,
they'll be ordering you.
And check it out, I created a secondary app that tracks your progress.
translation.zh:
‎你看 我做了一个附加软件
‎让你跟踪你的进展

translation.en: As you make more money, your avatar gets closer to your goal.
translation.zh:
‎你赚的钱越多
‎你的人物会越接近终点

translation.en: I'm calling it MyTraxx.
MyTraxx.
There's little Brooks riding it in there, he looks so innocent.
translation.zh:
‎看看那小布鲁克斯·拉蒂根
‎他看上去好无辜

translation.en: Yeah, but that's all in the past because you're a hooker now.
translation.zh: ‎但那都是过去了 你现在是个男妓了

translation.en: -What? No, I'm not. I'm a-- -I guess that makes me your pimp.
translation.zh:
‎-什么 我不是…
‎-也就是说 我是你的皮条客

translation.en: -A high-tech pimp, but a pimp nonetheless. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-一个高科技皮条客 但也是皮条客
‎-不

translation.en: I'm a gay teenage pimp,
wearing a secondhand hoodie. My life as I envisioned it.
translation.zh:
‎穿着二手的衣服
‎正如我想象中的生活一样

translation.en: I am not gonna be sleeping--
Yeah, I know, because if you did, we'd both go to jail,
translation.zh:
‎我知道因为如果你有的话
‎我们俩都得坐牢

translation.en: which rhymes with Yale and yet is so different,
translation.zh: ‎监狱和耶鲁大学比起来… ‎差远了

translation.en: but you have your new rich friends to bail you out.
translation.zh: ‎但你会有新的富人朋友帮你保释

translation.en: Okay, Murph, first of all, I don't have any new friends.
translation.zh: ‎好了 墨菲 首先 我没有新朋友

translation.en: Okay? And second of all, I'm offering my services as a chaperone.
translation.zh: ‎其次 我的服务只是陪伴

translation.en: Whatever, man. What do we do now?
translation.zh: ‎随便啦 我们现在该怎么做？

translation.en: What one does when bringing a new product to market?
Talk about it incessantly on Reddit, until it sounds really important.
translation.zh:
‎在红迪网上不停地说
‎直到它听上去很重要

translation.en: What is a Reddit?
-[chuckles] What's going on? -Breakfast for two.
Why?
Because families eat breakfast together, even really small ones.
translation.zh:
‎因为家人应该一起吃早餐
‎哪怕家庭再小

translation.en: Next year, when you're off to college,
I'll be a family of one, so now we eat pancakes.
translation.zh: ‎我将是一个人 但现在… ‎我们一起吃松饼

translation.en: Pancakes.
-Thank you. -Mm-hmm.
What is going on?
I haven't seen this look on your face since Mom let you buy a motorcycle.
translation.zh:
‎上次见你这么开心
‎还是妈妈让你买摩托车的时候

translation.en: I'm sorry, I couldn't help myself.
I saw it in the mail this morning and I just had to open it.
translation.zh:
‎今天早晨我在信箱看到这封信
‎我不得不打开

translation.en: UCONN, you got in, full ride.
translation.zh:
‎康涅狄格大学
‎你被录取了 全额奖学金

translation.en: I know, you think you got in because I teach there.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 你会觉得
‎你被录取是因为我在那里教课

translation.en: Dad, you teach a continued ed night class, two Wednesdays a month.
translation.zh:
‎爸 你在那里只是
‎每个月上两堂成人夜校的课

translation.en: I don't think that had anything to do with...
Look, I'm sorry, I just...
I haven't worked my ass off for the past three and a half years
to go to a public college, Dad.
Look, I gotta get to work.
I don't know how you managed it, but you ruined pancakes.
translation.zh:
‎我不懂你是怎么做到的
‎但你毁了松饼

translation.en: That's impressive.
Dear Office of Admissions,
My name is Brooks Rattigan
translation.zh: ‎我名叫布鲁克斯·拉蒂根… ‎来自于拉蒂根家族

translation.en: of House Wreck.
Murph, you Prince of Connecticut, you King of Reddit.
translation.zh:
‎墨菲 你是康涅狄格王子
‎你是网络之王

translation.en: And of course, the whole abstract expressionist movement
translation.zh: ‎当然 整个抽象表现主义运动

translation.en: really gained notoriety from Jackson Pollock,
translation.zh: ‎从杰克逊·波洛克得到了恶名

translation.en: whose, you know, influence is clearly present here.
translation.zh: ‎他的影响力在这里能清晰看到

translation.en: ♪ Like the back of my hand ♪
translation.zh: ‎（波洛克 抽象表现主义画家）

translation.en: ♪ They kiss on the ring ♪
translation.zh: ‎（情侣网球比赛 接受 拒绝）

translation.en: Suck it, Bill and Claire!
translation.zh: ‎接招吧 比尔 克莱尔！

translation.en: So, sports, right?
Isn't it interesting how many there are?
translation.zh: ‎有那么多种体育 真有趣

translation.en: And how some use balls and some... don't?
And pucks. There's pucks.
Okay, I'm terrible at this.
I should just never go on a real date, ever.
No, no, no, no, you're doing great.
This is one small step for man.
Talk about what you want to talk about, not what you think I want to talk about.
translation.zh:
‎说你想说的
‎而不是说你认为我想谈论的

translation.en: Yeah, okay, that makes sense.
So, what do you want to talk about?
Um, well, this morning I did see a very large man walking a very tiny dog.
translation.zh:
‎今天早晨我看到了一个很胖的人
‎在遛一条很小的狗

translation.en: Oh, my God, I...
-I love it when that happens. -Me too.
translation.zh:
‎-我最喜欢看到那些事了
‎-我也是

translation.en: -[message tone] -[beep]
translation.zh: ‎（萨尔萨舞蹈 接受 拒绝）

translation.en: Howdy.
Hola.
Hey.
♪ I'm the man ♪
Brooks. Look, I'm not good at apologies,
translation.zh:
‎-我是布鲁克斯
‎-我不擅长道歉

translation.en: but I feel I owe you one, because you're a gentleman
translation.zh:
‎但我觉得我该给你道歉
‎因为你是位绅士

translation.en: and pretty fun to be around.
translation.zh: ‎你很有趣 你只是在工作

translation.en: You were just doing your job, but you were pretty smug too,
translation.zh: ‎你很有趣 你只是在工作 ‎但说实话 你也挺自以为是的

translation.en: so it shouldn't be a whole apology, but a half apology,
translation.zh:
‎所以我觉得不该给你一个完整的道歉
‎半个道歉差不多

translation.en: so I'm half sorry, is that cool?
Yeah, I'm sorry, who's this?
Oh, Jeez, sorry, it's Celia. So do you accept my half apology or not?
translation.zh:
‎哦 天哪 不好意思 我是西利亚
‎你接不接受我的一半道歉？

translation.en: Well, you are half forgiven, but fully admired for the effort.
translation.zh:
‎我一半原谅你
‎但完全欣赏你做出的努力

translation.en: Well, good,
because I'm in desperate need of your services.
Oh, God, what's your mom making you go to this time?
translation.zh:
‎哦 天哪
‎你妈妈这次又要让你参加什么？

translation.en: Is it a débutante ball? Ice cream social? Wait, let me guess.
translation.zh:
‎初学者舞会？冰淇淋聚会？
‎再让我猜猜

translation.en: Is it a horse auction?
Aha. No, yeah, that's pretty accurate.
No, there's this boy I like, Franklin.
translation.zh: ‎不 有一个我喜欢的男孩 弗兰克林

translation.en: Hold on, Celia,
you have a crush?
Is that so hard to believe?
Yes, it is. That's why you're hearing disbelief in my tone.
translation.zh:
‎是的 这就是为什么从我的语气中
‎你能听到怀疑

translation.en: Just because I'm a little weird, doesn't make me less human,
translation.zh:
‎虽然我有点奇怪
‎但这不代表我缺乏人性

translation.en: in fact, it makes me more human.
translation.zh: ‎相反 这让我更具有人性

translation.en: So, there's this party at Shelby's house tonight--
translation.zh: ‎今天晚上在谢尔比家有个派对…

translation.en: Yes. Oh, my God, yes.
-A hundred times, yes. -Whoa, reel it in there, cowboy.
translation.zh:
‎真是好消息 ‎-别那么着急
‎-我是说…

translation.en: I mean...
I barely wanna go.
Yeah, so I'm thinking, listen, we show up as a hot couple,
translation.zh: ‎我想我们可以扮做一对情侣出席

translation.en: get Franklin a little jealous,
maybe you can stir up some attention from Shelby.
translation.zh: ‎也许你也可以引起谢尔比的注意

translation.en: So, pick me up at seven.
It's a date.
And Celia, next time you require my services,
translation.zh: ‎对了 西利亚 下次 ‎如果你需要我的服务

translation.en: could you use my app?
Oh, my God, you didn't?
translation.zh: ‎哦 天哪 不是真的吧？

translation.en: Oh, but I did.
[laughs] Okay, this is way more than a mints and tiny bottles of water.
translation.zh: ‎这已经不只是薄荷糖和矿泉水了

translation.en: This is a full-on bespoke concierge service. Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-这是一个完整定制的礼宾服务
‎-是的 女士

translation.en: Okay, so what's the weirdest Brooks Rattigan you've been thus far?
translation.zh:
‎你目前当过的最奇怪的
‎布鲁克斯·拉蒂根是什么？

translation.en: I had a date the other night, where I had to just sit on this girl's couch
translation.zh:
‎有天晚上约会
‎我得坐在那女孩的沙发上

translation.en: and listen to her talk for four hours straight,
translation.zh:
‎听她不停地说四个小时
‎我唯一允许说的是

translation.en: and all I was allowed to say was, "Yes, I agree,"
translation.zh:
‎听她不停地说四个小时
‎我唯一允许说的是 ‎“是” ‎“我同意”

translation.en: and "There's no other way to see it."
-My God, that is the perfect date. -There's no other way to see it.
translation.zh:
‎-天哪 那才是个完美的约会
‎-你说的完全没错

translation.en: Hey, thank you.
Son, a couple of things. The shifter sticks a little bit,
translation.zh: ‎有些事我要提醒你 变速器有点卡

translation.en: and the passenger window doesn't close all the way, so watch out for that.
translation.zh: ‎副驾驶窗关不紧 注意一下

translation.en: And there's a spring in the seat cushion, so do not lean all the way back.
translation.zh:
‎座位垫里有一个弹簧
‎不要向后靠到底

translation.en: Wow. What, does Bruce Wayne live here?
translation.zh: ‎哇 这是蝙蝠侠的房子吗？

translation.en: You know, Shelby's dad's basically Batman,
translation.zh: ‎如果蝙蝠侠是个没有金融法律意识的

translation.en: if Bruce Wayne was a sleazy hedge fund manager
with a questionable sense of finance law.
translation.zh: ‎那谢尔比的爸爸就真的是蝙蝠侠

translation.en: You guys made it.
Hey.
-Uh, your place is amazing. -Oh, thank you.
It really makes me reconsider the allure
of living in a three-room house with a view of Target.
translation.zh: ‎塔吉特百货对面三室小屋的吸引力

translation.en: Oh, he's kidding, obviously. Brooks is from Darien.
translation.zh:
‎哦 他明显在开玩笑
‎布鲁克斯来自达里恩

translation.en: Oh, my God, I love it there.
translation.zh: ‎哦 天哪 我最爱那里

translation.en: It's just so beautiful,
it makes this neighborhood look like a shanty town.
translation.zh: ‎它让这里显得像一个很简陋的小镇

translation.en: Could you excuse me for one moment?
It seems the family dog escaped his room.
Don't go anywhere.
I wouldn't want to get lost.
-Dad. -What?
Darien? Really?
Hey, this is Shelby Pace we're trying to impress here.
translation.zh:
‎你想留下好印象的人可是
‎谢尔比·佩斯

translation.en: Either go big or go home, son.
Oh, my God, that's Franklin. Abort, let's go.
translation.zh:
‎哦 天哪 是弗兰克林 任务取消
‎我们走

translation.en: This is the whole reason that we're here.
translation.zh: ‎等等 这是我们来这里的原因

translation.en: I know, but I just didn't expect to see him so soon,
translation.zh:
‎我知道
‎但我没有想到会这么快见到他

translation.en: I thought I'd have some time to, I don't know, like clutch my bearings.
translation.zh: ‎我以为我会有点时间来…准备一下

translation.en: Relax. Okay, which one is he?
-Is he the guy in the yellow shirt? -Yes, stop being so obvious.
translation.zh:
‎-是穿黄衬衫的那个吗？
‎-是的 别那么明显

translation.en: -He's cute. -Stop it.
Pretend to have a conversation with me.
We could also have a real conversation, that might be way less weird.
translation.zh:
‎我们也可以真的说话
‎这样会显得正常得多

translation.en: Fine, whatever, you start.
Where are you planning on going to college?
Uh, University of Michigan.
Wait, you're not going Ivy League? Isn't that, like, your birthright?
translation.zh:
‎你不打算上常春藤盟校？ ‎-这可是你天生的权力
‎-拜托了 见到没？

translation.en: Please, you see this?
translation.zh:
‎-这可是你天生的权力
‎-拜托了 见到没？

translation.en: This is the precise number of shits I give about the Ivy League.
translation.zh: ‎我对常春藤盟校的在乎程度为零

translation.en: Well, I give many more shits than that.
You know, if you want to go talk to him,
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？如果你想去和他说话

translation.en: you should just go talk to him.
I know, I'm working up to it.
-This is ridiculous, come on. -Stop it.
translation.zh:
‎-这太可笑了 来吧
‎-别这样

translation.en: You're making it worse by making a scene.
translation.zh:
‎你制造这么大的动静
‎你把事情变得更糟了

translation.en: -You are such a brute. -It's one of my more likable qualities.
translation.zh:
‎-你真是野蛮
‎-这是我讨人喜欢的一点

translation.en: Have you seen this collection? She is a music fiend,
translation.zh: ‎你见过这些收藏吗？她是个音乐狂

translation.en: always going on and on about bands.
Bands that I've never heard of, so you know they're cool, right?
translation.zh:
‎都是我从来没有听说过的乐队
‎他们一定很酷

translation.en: Not in like a mainstream way cool, more like a subversive.
translation.zh:
‎不是主流的那种酷
‎更像是反传统的那种…

translation.en: Tell him.
I like music and records.
Me too. I mean, vinyl is the only pure delivery method, right?
translation.zh:
‎-和唱片
‎-我也是 ‎我是说
‎黑胶唱片是唯一的无损传播方式

translation.en: Yeah, I'm always saying that.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我也是一直在这么说

translation.en: Music should only be listened to
on melted and then pressed vinyl discs.
There are kids our age, they've never even heard a vinyl record before.
translation.zh:
‎有些我们同龄的孩子
‎他们从来没有听过黑胶唱片

translation.en: [Celia] They don't know what they're missing,
translation.zh: ‎他们不知道他们错过了什么…

translation.en: or worse,
they do.
You know your girlfriend is over there talking to Franklin Volley?
translation.zh:
‎你知道你女朋友在那里和
‎弗兰克林·沃里说话吗？

translation.en: Everything is so compressed on digital, it's like drinking a frozen OJ
translation.zh: ‎数码音乐都被压缩过了 ‎就像不喝鲜榨橙汁 反倒喝冰冻橙汁

translation.en: instead of a fresh-squeezed OJ.
translation.zh: ‎就像不喝鲜榨橙汁 反倒喝冰冻橙汁

translation.en: Yeah, it's okay, we trust each other. I'm not really the jealous type.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我们彼此信任 我不吃醋

translation.en: -How refreshing. -Well, I aim to refresh.
-You're funny. -Me?
Most guys I know don't realize they can be both rich and funny.
translation.zh:
‎我认识的大多数男生都不明白
‎他们可以既有钱 又有趣

translation.en: Well, you can, I'm obviously living proof.
Hey.
They have a separate freezer for ice cream.
translation.zh: ‎这里专门有一个冰箱放冰淇淋

translation.en: I was alone in the kitchen and started to applaud.
translation.zh: ‎我一个人在厨房里开心地拍手了

translation.en: -Mm. -So, we have Boom Chocolotta
and plain old vanilla. Oh, thank you.
-Really? -Yo.
Don't knock vanilla, okay? It's a...
It seems a little boring, I give you that,
but there's a lot of nuance flavors hiding inside.
translation.zh: ‎但它里面藏有很多微妙的味道

translation.en: Kind of like you.
-Wow, so I'm vanilla. -Yeah.
Somehow you always manage to compliment and insult me at the same time.
It's a hereditary gift, on my mom's side.
translation.zh:
‎这是遗传下来的天赋
‎来自我妈妈那边

translation.en: Where's Franklin?
Oh, he's somewhere. I don't really wanna see that much of him.
translation.zh: ‎哦 他就在附近 我不想老见到他

translation.en: -What? -Before our date.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-至少约会前我不想老见到他

translation.en: What? Franklin asked you out? That's great.
translation.zh: ‎什么？弗兰克林约你了？太棒了

translation.en: No, actually, I asked him out,
because I am the master of my universe, and yeah, it's pretty great.
translation.zh: ‎因为我是我世界的主宰 挺不错的

translation.en: Oh, separate but related, it gives us a pretty good reason for our breakup.
translation.zh:
‎若即若离
‎这给我们一个很好的分手理由

translation.en: -I see your game, you meet someone new. -Hit it and quit it, baby.
translation.zh:
‎-我看出来了 你认识了新的人
‎-泡到了就甩掉 宝贝儿

translation.en: Okay, there's this huge birthday party that's supposed to happen in a few weeks,
translation.zh: ‎过几个星期 有一个很大的生日派对

translation.en: and everyone's gonna be there, including your girl, Shelby.
translation.zh:
‎所有人都会在场
‎包括你喜欢的那个谢尔比

translation.en: Just the breakup has to be public, like very public.
translation.zh: ‎只是分手一定要很公开 非常公开

translation.en: Can you imagine if I date Shelby and get into Yale?
translation.zh:
‎你能想象如果我和谢尔比约会
‎加上被耶鲁录取吗？

translation.en: I mean, that would be it, that would be my dream come true.
Oh, God, I feel bad for you.
You're just relying on external factors for your happiness,
waiting for people to accept you instead of accepting yourself.
translation.zh:
‎你在等着别人接受你
‎而不是先接受自己

translation.en: I mean, what could go wrong?
Isn't that exactly what you're doing with Franklin?
translation.zh: ‎你和弗兰克林不就是这样吗？

translation.en: -You're just jealous. -Of what?
Um, my connection with Franklin. It's more cerebral.
translation.zh:
‎我和弗兰克林的关系… ‎-更多是思想上的
‎-拜托

translation.en: Please.
Like you're not at all interested in him 'cause he's hot.
translation.zh:
‎你说得好像你不是因为他帅
‎才对他有兴趣的

translation.en: Whoa, his brain is hot, okay?
I can just picture his gorgeous frontal lobe.
-Gross. -Yeah, that was unintentionally gross.
translation.zh:
‎-真恶心
‎-确实 无意中的恶心

translation.en: Fine, I like him because of his brains and, you know,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我喜欢他 是因为他的头脑 ‎你知道…正巧
‎连在一起的那张脸也很漂亮

translation.en: the beautiful face that's attached to it.
translation.zh:
‎你知道…正巧
‎连在一起的那张脸也很漂亮

translation.en: There you go, so we're both shallow teenagers.
translation.zh: ‎那就对了 我们俩都是肤浅的少年

translation.en: It would appear so.
-You're really sweet. -Yeah.
-Can I have some of that, please? -Whoa! No! No way.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以吃点你的吗？
‎-哇 不行！

translation.en: [laughs] So, I might be able to help. My dad knows the president.
translation.zh: ‎我可以帮你 我爸爸认识校长

translation.en: -Of what country? -Of Yale.
Um, they've been playing poker, like forever,
translation.zh: ‎他们从很早开始就一起打扑克

translation.en: and I guess my dad's been losing to him for ten years,
in case I ever wanted to go.
So, the fact I don't wanna go is kind of a sore point.
I don't get it, rich people all know each other.
translation.zh:
‎我不明白 有钱人都互相认识
‎我连我的理发师都不认识

translation.en: -I don't even know who my barber is. -Okay, do you want my help or not?
translation.zh:
‎我不明白 有钱人都互相认识
‎我连我的理发师都不认识 ‎-好吧 那你要不要我帮忙了？
‎-要 一百个要

translation.en: Yes. A hundred times, yes.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 那你要不要我帮忙了？
‎-要 一百个要

translation.en: Well, no promises, but I can check with him.
translation.zh: ‎我不能保证 但我可以问问他

translation.en: What? Are you serious? Wow.
Thank you. All I got for you is wow.
Well, I'm a woman of much wow.
Hey, man, I'll give you 50 bucks for your car.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 伙计
‎我拿50块钱买你的车 好吗？

translation.en: -Oh, you think that's funny? -Yeah, I do.
-Hey. -Hey.
What's with the get-up?
Uh, I figured if I'm going to Yale, I'd better start stepping it up.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得如果我要上耶鲁
‎我得换一种生活方式

translation.en: Hey, what's going on with all the late nights lately?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你最近怎么这么晚回来？

translation.en: Uh, you know, the usual teenage stuff, school projects, dances, 24-hour raves.
translation.zh:
‎你懂的 青年人的事儿 学校活动
‎舞会 还有24小时酒宴

translation.en: Hm. Atta boy.
Do you think you could clean up one day? I mean, it's starting to look a little...
translation.zh:
‎你哪天要不要收拾一下？
‎这里开始看起来有点…

translation.en: condemned in here.
I'm gonna get to it.
I could help you, if you want.
I think I do.
And actually, you have helped.
I submitted a collection of my short stories of this fellowship,
translation.zh:
‎我提交了我写的关于伙伴关系的
‎短故事集

translation.en: because you were so terribly and vividly mean to me.
So, thank you for being a supportive
translation.zh: ‎所以 谢谢你是一个支持我的

translation.en: asshole.
Anytime.
-Good night, Pops. -Good night, buddy.
Hey, look, little Brooks is almost a third of the way to his goal.
translation.zh:
‎看看 布鲁克斯已经差不多
‎在成功的道路上行进了三分之一

translation.en: If I keep getting business like this, I'm gonna be at little Yale by the summertime.
translation.zh: ‎如果我的生意一直这样好 ‎我夏天就能到耶鲁了

translation.en: That's great, man. Really.
What is that? What...
You seem distant.
Well, I guess I am.
We just usually have stuff to talk about, because we spend time together,
translation.zh: ‎我们平时有得聊 因为我们总在一起

translation.en: or we used to.
So, distance is making us distant, which makes sense to me.
translation.zh: ‎但距离产生疏远 这很正常

translation.en: But it's fine, really. We're gonna grow apart when we go to college,
translation.zh:
‎但没事的 真的
‎我们上了大学后会分开的

translation.en: so we might as well get the process started now.
Okay, well,
how about this?
I'm totally booked out tonight and tomorrow,
but I am completely free on Saturday and I will make sure it stays that way,
translation.zh:
‎但我星期六没有事
‎我保证不安排别的事

translation.en: if you promise to go to Tino's with me.
translation.zh: ‎如果你保证和我一起去蒂诺的店

translation.en: Count me in.
Oh, hey, can we hit that new zombie-themed escape room afterwards?
translation.zh:
‎之后我们可以去那家新开的
‎僵尸主题的密室逃脱吗？

translation.en: Yes, I am in.
All right.
Hello again.
-Hey, I'll take a-- -Tuna melt on seven grain.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 又见面了
‎-你好 ‎-我要…
‎-金枪鱼谷物三明治

translation.en: Yeah.
-Uh, thanks. -Murph is my given name.
Oh, I guess I gotta give you this.
I just remembered that this is when you usually come by.
translation.zh: ‎我记得你平时都是这个时候来

translation.en: -Yeah. -We get paid a dollar above minimum wage,
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-我们的收入比最低工资高一块钱

translation.en: so we're encouraged to provide top service.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们应该提供最好的服务

translation.en: Uh, well, thanks, Murph.
-What? -You were blushing.
Who is that? Huh?
Hey, yo, I work at White Castle, okay? You know what that means,
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我在白色城堡上班
‎你们知道那是什么意思吗？

translation.en: I see some of the finest bitches in the world every damn day,
translation.zh: ‎我每天都能见到世界上最漂亮的小妞

translation.en: and, Pops, I gotta tell you with the utmost respect,
translation.zh: ‎还有 老爹 我必须得告诉你

translation.en: your daughter,
she's got to be one of the finest bitches I have ever seen in my entire life,
translation.zh: ‎她是我这辈子见过最漂亮的小妞

translation.en: and I've been to the Westminster Dog Show, okay? All right.
translation.zh:
‎我去过威斯敏斯特犬类选美大会
‎你懂吗？

translation.en: I have to take the browns to the Super Bowl,
and by that I mean I gotta take a hot deuce, right?
translation.zh: ‎意思是说我得拉个屎 明白了吗？

translation.en: Daddy-o, where the bathroom at?
It's down the hall on the left.
I love you, baby.
Hey, Celia.
What's up, Vanilla? What are you up to?
translation.zh: ‎你好 香草 你在干什么？

translation.en: I'm getting paid to be a douche to a girl's parents,
translation.zh:
‎一个女孩给我钱让我在她父母面前
‎装成一个混蛋

translation.en: so that they're more accepting of her real boyfriend when they actually meet him.
translation.zh:
‎这样他们见到她真的男朋友时
‎更能接受他

translation.en: Um, parents have it hard.
What are you doing tomorrow? Like early afternoonish?
What, for my best customer? I'm totally free. Why, what's up?
translation.zh: ‎为了我最好的客户 我没事 怎么了？

translation.en: I may have got you an interview with the Dean of Undergraduate Admissions at Yale.
translation.zh:
‎我给你争取了一个和耶鲁大学
‎本科招生主任面试的机会

translation.en: Oh, my God, Celia, I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 西利亚 我不知道该说什么了

translation.en: Well, why don't you try?
translation.zh:
‎-那你就试着说说看
‎-西利亚·利伯曼

translation.en: Celia Lieberman, you make flowers blossom.
translation.zh:
‎-那你就试着说说看
‎-西利亚·利伯曼 ‎-你使世界充满鲜花

translation.en: You are the reason trees have leaves.
You are a goddess.
Aw! That is absolutely correct.
translation.zh:
‎-你说的完全没错
‎-我什么时候来接你？

translation.en: -What time should I pick you up? -You shouldn't.
translation.zh:
‎-你说的完全没错
‎-我什么时候来接你？ ‎你别来

translation.en: This is your day, but it's my rules, so I'm gonna pick you up at one.
translation.zh:
‎这是你的好日子
‎但要按我的规矩来 我一点钟来接你

translation.en: I'll text you my address.
Bye.
Woo hoo! Yo, man, that number two turned to a number five real quick.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 拉坨屎真是费时间

translation.en: Where the plunger at?
What? I'm trying to look smart. Do I look too smart?
translation.zh:
‎怎么了？我想显得精神一点
‎我看上去精神吗？

translation.en: It looks like someone took a J. Crew store,
translation.zh: ‎你看上去像是有人把男士服装店

translation.en: put it in a cannon and shot it at your face.
translation.zh: ‎塞进了大炮里 射到了你脸上

translation.en: Thank you, so much. I mean, what do I do?
translation.zh: ‎太感谢你了 我刚怎么办？

translation.en: I don't understand clothes.
They're completely irrelevant yet somehow important.
translation.zh: ‎衣服和你本人无关 但同时有很重要

translation.en: Lose the glasses.
Go on, give it to me. Okay, that's better.
Do you need the cardigan? I'm gonna answer that. You don't need it.
translation.zh: ‎你要穿毛衣吗？ ‎我来帮你回答吧 你不用

translation.en: -I like the cardigan. -No one likes it.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢这件毛衣
‎-没人会喜欢

translation.en: -Intellectual people wear cardigans. -You do not look intellectual.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？知识分子穿毛衣的
‎-你看上去不像知识分子

translation.en: For the love of God, come on.
Oh, you know, what you do need though, you need a mani.
translation.zh: ‎你知道你需要什么吗？你需要修指甲

translation.en: That is a fight for another day, my friend.
Wow, who would have thought that Celia Lieberman could be so comforting?
translation.zh:
‎哇 谁会想到西利亚·利伯曼还会
‎安慰人？

translation.en: It's like underneath all these layers of angst and sarcasm,
translation.zh: ‎似乎在那层焦虑和讽刺底下

translation.en: there might actually be a human being.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Hey, relax.
All you gotta do is be yourself.
I mean, not this annoying, anxious version,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 不是这烦人、焦虑的你

translation.en: the better version.
I have been an astronaut, a cowboy and a douche, all in the past three days,
translation.zh: ‎最近三天我当过 ‎太空人、牛仔 还有一个混蛋

translation.en: so I don't know which version of myself I'm supposed to be right now.
Brooks Rattigan.
Dean's ready for you now.
-Hi. -Hi.
-[Celia] Hey. -Yeah?
You're gonna kill it.
You know,
unless you don't.
Mr. Rattigan, a pleasure to meet you.
-Take a seat. -Yes, sure.
So, tell me about yourself.
Yeah, I'd love to.
What says more about a person than numbers, right?
So, the first time I took the SAT I got a 1510,
and that was because I butchered the math section, but
I knuckled down, and I put work over parties,
translation.zh:
‎于是我加倍努力 不去参加派对
‎而是复习功课

translation.en: and I managed to bump it up to a 1570 on my second time around.
That's too bad.
I'm sorry?
Well, that you missed out on parties. Parties are fun.
translation.zh: ‎你错过了派对 派对很有意思

translation.en: It's important to enjoy life, especially at your age.
translation.zh:
‎享受生活很重要
‎特别是在你这个年龄

translation.en: With respect, it's not exactly the message that we get from our parents and teachers.
translation.zh:
‎我无意冒犯
‎但我们家长和老师可不是这么说的

translation.en: I grant you that, yeah.
Well...
Mr. Rattigan, academically speaking, you seem like the perfect candidate for Yale.
translation.zh: ‎拉蒂根先生 就成绩来说 ‎你很适合上耶鲁

translation.en: Thank you, sir. Coming from you that means a lot.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢先生 谢谢你这么说

translation.en: But I want to know a little something about you.
translation.zh: ‎但我想知道关于你的一些东西

translation.en: Tell me something about yourself, activities, hobbies.
translation.zh:
‎说说你自己 参加什么活动？
‎有什么兴趣爱好？

translation.en: Sure, well I'm in French Club, I'm a National Honors Society, and--
translation.zh:
‎没问题 我参加法语俱乐部 ‎-国家荣誉学会
‎-不对

translation.en: No.
No, I don't mean the things that you do,
because you think they look good on an application.
translation.zh: ‎这些似乎会使你的申请看起来不错

translation.en: What are some of your interests outside of school?
translation.zh: ‎学校之外 你有什么兴趣爱好？

translation.en: Outside of school?
Example, I had a kid in here yesterday, right there,
translation.zh:
‎我给你举个例子
‎昨天一个面试的孩子

translation.en: and he breeds trash-eating microbes in his spare time.
translation.zh: ‎他利用业余时间繁殖吃垃圾的微生物

translation.en: It's fascinating stuff.
I don't... breed trash-eating microbes.
I don't really breed microbes at all, but I do have hobbies,
translation.zh:
‎我不繁殖任何微生物
‎但我确实有个兴趣爱好

translation.en: and interests. I mean, so many of those.
There is this thing, but I think you'll find it stupid.
translation.zh:
‎就这个爱好来说 ‎-也许你会觉得很傻
‎-不会 说说看

translation.en: No, what? What is it?
translation.zh:
‎-也许你会觉得很傻
‎-不会 说说看

translation.en: Well lately, I've been getting into
honey bees.
I don't...
I'm sorry,
did you just say, "Honey bees?"
Yeah.
Yeah, I'm a bit of an amateur beekeeper.
-I know, it sounds silly. -No, it doesn't sound silly at all, to me.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道 这听起来很傻
‎-对我来说 这根本不傻

translation.en: I'm a bit of an apiarist myself.
-No kidding. -Yes.
Wow, what a small world.
Tell me, what's your bee of choice? I used to be all about the Russian bees,
translation.zh:
‎-说说 你选什么蜜蜂品种
‎-我以前都是选俄罗斯蜜蜂

translation.en: but then I found that their swarminess tended to be a little too--
translation.zh: ‎但我发现它们的集群方式有点…

translation.en: Unpredictable.
Unpredictable, that's right. So, now I'm a Buckfast man all the way.
translation.zh:
‎难以预测 没错
‎现在我只选布克法斯特蜂

translation.en: -They have so much more foraging zeal. -Yes.
Uh, and, you know, don't get me started on their resistance to tracheal mites.
translation.zh:
‎说到它们对气管螨虫的抵御能力
‎我会停不下来

translation.en: Tracheal mites.
As soon as you get that application done, you bring it into me personally, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你把申请写好后 拿回来交给我本人

translation.en: -Not my secretary. -I will, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-不要给我的秘书
‎-好的 先生

translation.en: -Sir, call me Delbert, please. -Okay.
And when you come by, don't forget to bring a jar of your honey.
translation.zh: ‎你来的时候别忘了带一瓶你的蜂蜜

translation.en: As long as you bring a jar of your honey,
translation.zh: ‎那你也给我带一瓶你的蜂蜜

translation.en: we can have ourselves a little honey swap.
Honey swap. [chuckling]
I love it.
It was a pleasure meeting you, Mr. Rattigan, truly.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴见到你 拉蒂根先生 真的

translation.en: The pleasure was mine, Delbert.
translation.zh: ‎应该是我很高兴 德尔伯特

translation.en: Thank you so much for setting this up. It went better than I could have imagined it.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你帮我安排这次会面
‎效果比我想象中还要好

translation.en: Well, happy to help. Just...
just one little tiny question.
Why exactly are you guys swapping honey?
What, is that unusual?
I can't believe you.
What? I did some research before my interview, okay?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？我只是在面试前做了些功课

translation.en: Hold on a second. What is the difference between me spouting a few beekeeping facts
translation.zh: ‎等一下 我杜撰一些养蜜蜂的事情

translation.en: and any of the Stand-In dates that I've been on? Huh?
translation.zh: ‎和我替人参加约会有什么区别？

translation.en: You know that I'm not an art historian or a douche, right?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我既不是艺术史学家
‎也不是个混蛋

translation.en: No, actually I don't know that, and this is completely different.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 这完全不一样

translation.en: Those girls paid you to lie to them, and this time you did it all on your own.
translation.zh:
‎那些姑娘花钱听你撒谎
‎而这次是你自作主张

translation.en: Look, it is hustle, baby, pure hustle.
Oh, God, please don't ever say that again.
It did sound a little bit better coming out of Reece's mouth.
translation.zh: ‎里斯这么说的时候听起来好多了

translation.en: Wait, Reece? My cousin, Reece? What does he know about hustle?
translation.zh:
‎等等 里斯？我的表兄里斯？
‎他懂什么自信？

translation.en: It's how he got his BMW.
Brooks, Reece got his car because his dad started having an affair
translation.zh:
‎布鲁克斯 里斯之所以有那辆车
‎是因为他爸爸

translation.en: with his sister's JV tennis coach, and his mom found out about it,
translation.zh:
‎和她妹妹的网球教练搞婚外恋
‎后来他妈妈发现了

translation.en: so she starts sleeping with the dude who owns a bunch of BMW dealerships,
translation.zh:
‎于是她自己开始和
‎宝马售车处的老板上床

translation.en: hence the BMW.
-What, so no hustle? -No.
You're telling me
that Reece got a brand new BMW i8, because
his parents are shitty people?
Yeah. So, maybe you should rethink who your role models are.
translation.zh:
‎没错 也许你该重新考虑
‎把谁当做你的榜样了

translation.en: -What about Shelby and Franklin? -What about Shelby and Franklin?
translation.zh:
‎-那谢尔比和弗兰克林呢？
‎-谢尔比和弗兰克林怎么了？

translation.en: You don't know the first thing about vinyl, and I am certainly not from Darien.
translation.zh:
‎你对黑胶唱片一无所知
‎而我也不是来自于达里恩

translation.en: Okay? These are the lies that both of us made up to get what we want.
translation.zh:
‎我们撒这些谎
‎是为了得到我们想要的东西

translation.en: Storming off, fantastic. That's what people who're right and not hypocrites do.
translation.zh: ‎气冲冲地走了 太好了 ‎假冒伪善者可不会这样做

translation.en: Speak more words and I'll hurt you.
-Maybe you're right. -About which thing? There were a couple.
translation.zh:
‎-也许你是对的
‎-哪件事儿是对的？

translation.en: Maybe I am a hypocrite, okay?
translation.zh: ‎也许我有点假冒伪善 行了吧？

translation.en: My parents say that I stomp around
in my boots looking tough...
to push people away,
because
I'm too scared to show people who I really am.
translation.zh: ‎我害怕向别人展示真实的自己

translation.en: Oh, God, if anyone actually heard me saying this.
-Yeah, you know what I mean. -You're gonna be fine, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-你知道我什么意思
‎-你会没事的

translation.en: You are Celia Lieberman.
And being weird and confident are not mutually exclusive elements to life.
translation.zh: ‎奇怪和自信的人在生活中并不少见

translation.en: You happen to be a master of both of them.
translation.zh: ‎你恰好把这两个元素综合得很好

translation.en: -Do you really mean that? -Yes.
-Thanks. -You are welcome.
So, I can Brooks' house from across the street,
translation.zh: ‎布鲁克斯家就在我家街对面

translation.en: and sitting beside the outgoing mailbox,
there's this big flimsy cardboard box,
with like 20 postage stamps stuck to it and just one word written across the top,
translation.zh:
‎上面贴着20来张邮票
‎箱子上只写着一个词

translation.en: Idaho.
So, the mailman picks it up, and immediately the box gives out,
translation.zh: ‎邮递员把箱子拿起来 箱子就破了

translation.en: and little six-year-old Brooks slips out the bottom,
translation.zh: ‎六岁的布鲁克斯从箱子里滑出来

translation.en: and hits the pavement like, "Bam!"
I'm hiding across the street watching it all, like...
-Just laughing my ass off. -Okay, wait, so what did you do?
translation.zh:
‎-这可把我给笑坏了
‎-等一下 你做了什么？

translation.en: I mean the only thing that I could do is "Good afternoon, Mr. Postman,"
and I grabbed my backpack and went back inside my house.
I can't believe you tried to mail yourself to Idaho.
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信
‎你想把自己邮寄到爱达荷州

translation.en: -Thanks, Brooks. -Thank you so much. I got this.
-Thank you. -Yeah, of course.
-Nice guy. -Fancy man.
Okay, so of all places, why Idaho?
It's where his mom lives.
Yeah, she's married to some rich pediatrician
translation.zh: ‎她嫁给了一个什么有钱的儿科医师

translation.en: or rich plastic surgeon, rich pediatric plastic surgeon.
translation.zh:
‎或者整容医生
‎或者什么小儿科的整容医生

translation.en: And they have two kids together
and every year they send Brooks and his dad a Christmas card
translation.zh:
‎每年他们都会给布鲁克斯和他爸爸
‎寄圣诞卡…

translation.en: with a picture of her whole new family.
translation.zh: ‎附上她和那个医生一家四口的照片

translation.en: You know, which to me, seems totally screwed up.
[Brooks] See you, Tino!
-Was that tuna melt on seven grain? -If only.
-Uh? Tuna melt on seven grain? -It's nothing.
Murph here has a little crush on one of the Sub shop regulars.
translation.zh: ‎墨菲爱上了我们店里的一位常客

translation.en: We don't know his name, so we call him by his order.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道他名字
‎就拿他经常点的东西叫他

translation.en: He hasn't been in the shop for a week.
translation.zh: ‎他已经一个星期没来店里了

translation.en: I think I scared him off by pre-making his sandwich.
translation.zh:
‎也许我预先制作他的三明治
‎令他害怕了

translation.en: Aw, you pre-made his sandwich?
-That is adorable. -Listen, you're gonna be fine.
translation.zh:
‎-真有你的
‎-听着 你会没事的

translation.en: He'll show up, and if not,
translation.zh: ‎他会出现的 要是他不出现…

translation.en: who cares, right?
You are going to find the right sandwich one day, my friend.
translation.zh: ‎有一天你会找到属于自己的三明治

translation.en: That is the lamest thing you've ever said.
-Yeah, but you're laughing, aren't you? -Get away from me, get away.
translation.zh:
‎-看把你逗笑了 不是吗？
‎-你别理我！

translation.en: I'm glad someone's getting something out of my dating life.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴我的恋爱生活给了某人灵感

translation.en: Yeah.
All right, Godspeed to you on your date tonight.
translation.zh: ‎好的 再见 祝你和你的对象今晚好运

translation.en: Are you ready to
get some zombies?
I am.
But you seem unenthusiastic.
No, man. I got a request while we were eating.
translation.zh:
‎我不去了 我们吃东西的时候
‎我有了活儿

translation.en: Take it.
What? Are you serious?
Really.
All right, thank you. You're a really good friend.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 谢谢 你真是个好朋友

translation.en: Hey, good to meet you.
Yeah, you too.
-It was what? -It was, it was…
-[Brooks] Your insurance must be so high. -[Celia] Yeah.
[Celia] You know what?
Does the master have any advice for me, for my big date?
translation.zh: ‎约会高手有什么建议要给我？

translation.en: Yeah, I do actually.
-Good. -Don't dance.
-That is so offensive. Get out of my car. -I was just trying to help you.
translation.zh:
‎-这话太伤人了 你给我下车
‎-我只是想帮你

translation.en: You know, today was horrible
until it wasn't.
I agree.
Do me a favor, would you have fun tonight? Seriously, you're gonna dazzle him.
translation.zh:
‎帮我个忙 你今晚要玩开心
‎真的 你要亮瞎他的眼睛…

translation.en: Unless you don't.
Get out of my car.
-I will drive off. -Okay.
-Right now. -I'm out. Have a good night.
translation.zh:
‎-马上下车
‎-我下了 祝你晚上愉快

translation.en: [Franklin] The truth about coffee,
it's all in the grind.
It has to be precise or the water,
translation.zh: ‎一切必须精准无误 否则

translation.en: it seeps through the filter too quickly, and you end up with a weak-ass brew.
translation.zh:
‎水渗透下来的速度会太快了
‎咖啡味就不浓

translation.en: Wow, you know a lot about coffee.
translation.zh: ‎哇 对于咖啡你懂很多啊

translation.en: Pour Over is an art form.
It's not like that overly processed swill you've got.
translation.zh: ‎不像你手里这杯被过度处理的泔水

translation.en: I don't know, I kind of like my overly processed swill.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道了
‎其实我蛮喜欢我的被过度处理的泔水

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I didn't mean to insult you. I ramble when I'm nervous.
translation.zh:
‎我不是想要羞辱你
‎我一紧张就不知道自己该说什么

translation.en: Wait, did you just say you're nervous?
-Of course I am. -Why?
I don't know if this is a date or not, because you have a boyfriend.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道我们这算不算是约会
‎因为你有男朋友

translation.en: Oh, Brooks is not...
Um, he is my boyfriend, and we are dating hard.
We're dating hard, but, you know, we have, um,
translation.zh: ‎我们在谈恋爱 但我们的关系

translation.en: one of those advanced modern relationships.
translation.zh: ‎是一种非常前卫现代的关系

translation.en: We don't belong to anyone.
I watched this Nat Geo doc about dung beetles,
translation.zh:
‎在国家地理频道
‎我看过屎壳郎的纪录片

translation.en: how they find their mates by analyzing the movements of a prospective mate's wings,
translation.zh:
‎通过观察对方翅膀的动作
‎它们找到交配对象

translation.en: and if they move in the same specific way, they know they found their mate.
translation.zh:
‎如果它们翅膀的动作是一样的
‎那它们就是一对儿

translation.en: Watching you and Brooks, you move the same,
translation.zh:
‎我观察了你和布鲁克斯
‎你们的动作是一样的

translation.en: like a couple of adorable dung beetles.
Well,
we're not shit-eating beetles, though.
We're actually gonna be breaking up very soon. In fact, very soon.
translation.zh:
‎其实我们很快就要分手了 ‎-很快
‎-好吧

translation.en: -Okay. -Um-hmm.
So, I'm encouraged.
-Oh, hi. -Hey.
So, you're into vinyl,
and you're obviously very passionate about coffee.
What else are you into?
I'm passionate about a lot of things, most of all, my art.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢很多东西
‎我最喜欢的是我的艺术

translation.en: That's cool, I like art.
-What's your medium? -The street.
No.
Actually, you may have seen some of my stuff, like, around town.
translation.zh:
‎-骗人
‎-其实… ‎你可能在城里见过我的作品

translation.en: What?
Don't say it.
I'm Trashbug.
You said it.
You said who you are.
-Are you familiar with my work? -Uh-huh.
Okay, you know how I did like a baby in a gas mask,
translation.zh: ‎我画过一幅戴毒气面罩的婴儿

translation.en: and I did like an old man in gas mask. Oh, yeah.
Right now, I'm working on something that is going to blow those away.
translation.zh: ‎现在我正在创作的作品要超越这些

translation.en: A cat in a gas mask.
It's a commentary on itself and on Dr. Seuss. I mean, cats don't wear hats.
translation.zh:
‎这幅作品自己能说明问题
‎苏斯博士有过评论 猫不戴帽子

translation.en: That is
a very creative idea.
Dude,
Saturday night was insane. I just can't tell if it was in a good or bad way.
translation.zh:
‎周六晚上太疯狂了
‎我都不知道那是好 还是不好了？

translation.en: You think high school parties are crazy, they have got nothing on office parties.
translation.zh:
‎你觉得高中派对很不错
‎那跟办公室派对没法儿比

translation.en: I saw a drunk guy snort a line of printer toner.
translation.zh:
‎我见到一个喝醉的家伙拿打印机碳粉
‎当白粉吸

translation.en: Thanks again for letting me off the hook.
Wow, what a great image of our friendship.
translation.zh: ‎哇 我们的友谊是多么伟大的形象啊

translation.en: I'm a fisherman,
reeling you in against your will to your death.
translation.zh: ‎让你违背自己的意愿走向死亡

translation.en: That's not how I meant it. How was your night?
translation.zh:
‎我不是这个意思
‎那天晚上你怎么样？

translation.en: I was alone, so I got paired with this group of drunk Germans.
translation.zh:
‎我是一个人去的
‎我被安排了和一群喝醉的德国人组队

translation.en: They didn't speak a word of English,
so I wasn't included in any of the puzzle solving, and to top if all off,
translation.zh:
‎所以我没有参与任何解谜
‎更糟糕的是

translation.en: a zombie, it got me in like the first ten minutes.
translation.zh: ‎刚开始十分钟 一个僵尸就逮到了我

translation.en: -The zombie actually bit you? -No.
One of the Germans did.
It's not funny, sorry, just...
[chuckling] It is a little funny. It's funny, if you think it's funny too.
translation.zh:
‎还是有点好玩的
‎如果你觉得好玩就好玩

translation.en: But only if you...
-It's funny. Come on. -I gotta go to class.
translation.zh:
‎-好玩的 别这样
‎-我得上课去了

translation.en: Murph.
Murph.
-Hey. -No, you do not talk, I do the talking.
Excuse me? I trusted you,
Celia, and you chewed up that trust and you spit it in my face.
translation.zh:
‎西利亚
‎你把我的信任嚼碎 吐到我的脸上

translation.en: -Okay, what the hell is going on? -I'm practicing for the big show.
translation.zh:
‎-到底是怎么回事？
‎-我在为我们的作秀排练呢

translation.en: -Come on, did you forget? -Oh, yeah, our breakup.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么 你忘了？
‎-哦 我们的分手

translation.en: So, I'm thinking that Shelby and Franklin need to be there when it happens,
translation.zh: ‎我在想 当我们吵架分手的时候 ‎谢尔比和弗兰克林必须在场

translation.en: so when we go off on our own,
translation.zh: ‎谢尔比和弗兰克林必须在场

translation.en: they're gonna wanna console us.
Oh, shit, I almost forgot to ask you, how did your date go?
translation.zh: ‎我都忘了问你 你的约会怎么样？

translation.en: Well,
it was the...
start of something great. I, for one,
translation.zh:
‎-一段伟大恋情的开始
‎-我非常

translation.en: am super happy for you.
I am also happy for me
too.
-Yay. -Okay.
Dope, see ya.
Yeah, I'll see you later.
I don't know.
You don't know what?
It doesn't really feel like me.
You look incredible.
-Hi. -Hi.
-All set? -Yeah.
Dressed to kill.
Nice.
You know, to kill our fake love.
Good, that's good.
Tight dress.
-High heels. -Cool.
A live python around my neck.
Sorry, I'm just trying to figure out what I'm gonna say tonight.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我在考虑今晚说什么

translation.en: You're writing a breakup script?
Not a breakup script, more like breakup bullet points.
translation.zh: ‎不是分手台词 而是一些要点

translation.en: Oh, wow.
Celia, you look great.
Thanks.
Where's the snake?
-What's the plan? -Right.
Um, so I was thinking
you're gonna go in first.
You walk around, mingle a bit, do your thing.
Then, at exactly eight o'clock, you strike up a conversation with Franklin.
translation.zh: ‎八点整 你开始和弗兰克林聊天

translation.en: It'll play better if it seems like I'm catching you in the act.
translation.zh: ‎我当场抓住你们 这样效果更好

translation.en: You can put a gas mask on anything and have a real impact on people,
translation.zh:
‎你可以给任何东西带上防毒面具
‎这都能对观众产生冲击

translation.en: like Thomas Jefferson, Mr. Rogers,
translation.zh: ‎比如托马斯杰斐逊、罗杰斯先生…

translation.en: the Pope.
The Pope.
That is brilliant. I gotta jot that down.
You know that story about the guy who has to push a boulder up a hill?
translation.zh:
‎你知道
‎有个人想把巨石推上山的故事吗？

translation.en: Every time it gets to the top it rolls back down
translation.zh: ‎每次快到山顶 石头就会滚下来

translation.en: and he has to start all over again.
That's what talking to you is like.
Thank you.
So, you're saying I'm like Sisyphus?
[Brooks] Oh, my God!
You have a lot of nerve showing up here with him!
translation.zh: ‎你竟敢和他在这里招摇过市！

translation.en: Okay.
-What are you talking about? -You know exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-你知道我在说什么？

translation.en: -I heard about your little date. -It was just coffee.
translation.zh:
‎-我听说了你俩在谈恋爱
‎-我们只是在谈咖啡

translation.en: Please, to quote the great George Costanza, "Coffee is not coffee,"
translation.zh: ‎乔治·科斯坦扎说过 “咖啡不是咖啡

translation.en: coffee is sex.
Coffee is better than sex.
Especially from the rare Kopi Luwak bean.
translation.zh:
‎特别是稀有的
‎麝香猫咖啡豆磨出来的咖啡

translation.en: You think you're so much better than me, Celia?
Better than everyone here, but I know the truth.
translation.zh: ‎比这里所有的人都强？但我知道真相

translation.en: You're nothing but a hypocrite.
translation.zh: ‎你只不过是个假冒伪善的人

translation.en: A fake.
-Hold on a second. -So you stomp around in those boots,
and you act so tough, but that's all it is.
-It's just an act. -Brooks, please don't do this.
translation.zh:
‎-一切都是演戏
‎-布鲁克斯 别这样

translation.en: A defense mechanism, see it's a poor attempt
translation.zh: ‎一种防御机制 拒人千里之外的

translation.en: at pushing people away.
You're afraid that if somebody got too close to you,
they might actually find out the truth.
That Celia Lieberman,
she's boring.
You wanna push me away? Go ahead, cos we're through, baby.
translation.zh: ‎你想把我踢开？那就来吧 我们完了

translation.en: We are done, we are--
How's that for a defense mechanism?
translation.zh: ‎这作为防御机制来说怎么样？

translation.en: God, I hate these shoes.
Celia.
Celia! My dung beetle.
[Shelby] Brooks.
translation.zh:
‎（有史以来最佳表演
‎我差点以为是真的 干得漂亮！） ‎布鲁克斯

translation.en: -Hey, are you good? -Yeah, I'm fine.
Uh, physically I'm fine, but emotionally I'm...
translation.zh: ‎身体上来说我没事 但精神上…

translation.en: a wreck.
I hate to admit it, but I kind of saw this one coming.
translation.zh:
‎我不想承认
‎但我知道你们迟早会分手

translation.en: I mean, those two were being really chummy at my party.
translation.zh: ‎他们俩上次在我家的舞会上就很亲密

translation.en: Yeah, well I can be oblivious sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎是呀 有时候我会当局者迷

translation.en: Thank you for rubbing that in.
-So, here's a question. -Yes, whatever it is, yes.
translation.zh:
‎那… ‎-我想问你个问题
‎-随便什么问题 我都同意

translation.en: Will you go to formal with me?
translation.zh: ‎你愿意陪我参加正装舞会吗？

translation.en: I mean, do I have to speak or can you read my alarming fast heart rate? Yes.
translation.zh:
‎还用我说吗？从我加速的心跳
‎你看不出来吗？当然可以

translation.en: Hold on, you guys have another formal? How many does your school have?
translation.zh:
‎等一下 你们又有正装舞会了？
‎你们学校有多少正装舞会？

translation.en: As many that are needed to fund the new stables.
translation.zh:
‎为新的马厩募集资金
‎需要多少就有多少

translation.en: Murph, you will never believe what happened to me. Shelby kissed me.
translation.zh:
‎墨菲 你一定不会相信
‎谢尔比亲吻了我

translation.en: Oh, dude, congrats. I always knew you could do it.
translation.zh: ‎祝贺你 哥们儿 我就知道你能行

translation.en: -Who's Shelby? -Toby, why are you here? Where's Murph?
translation.zh: ‎谁是谢尔比？ ‎托比 你在干嘛？墨菲呢？

translation.en: -We switched shifts. -Why? Is he sick?
translation.zh:
‎-我和他换班了
‎-什么？他生病了吗？

translation.en: I don't think so, because it wasn't just for today.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我们不是只有今天换班

translation.en: It was for like the rest of the year.
translation.zh: ‎到年底前 我们都换班了

translation.en: -Did he say why? -No.
Oh, yeah, you know what, he did say that you were a selfish prick
translation.zh: ‎他倒是说过 你是个自私的家伙

translation.en: and that you only think about yourself.
You don't think that has anything to do with him switching shifts, do you?
translation.zh: ‎你不会觉得这和换班的事情有关吧？

translation.en: [woman] I guess you think this is pretty pathetic...
going for a walk with some old lady.
No, I feel like I actually needed this.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我觉得这正是我需要的

translation.en: My granddaughter set this up. I don't know the first thing about apps,
translation.zh:
‎这都是我孙女安排的
‎我对手机应用一窍不通

translation.en: unless it's the Bloomin' Onion at Outback Steakhouse.
translation.zh: ‎我只懂内地牛排屋的炸洋葱球

translation.en: -Now that's a good app. -Mm-hm.
My husband and I did this every day for the past 20 years.
translation.zh:
‎过去20年
‎我和我丈夫每天都这样散步

translation.en: -He passed away in June. -I'm so sorry to hear that.
translation.zh:
‎-他在六月份去世了
‎-我很替你难过

translation.en: Oliver.
That was his name.
He was ugly as sin.
His face was weird.
He had the right sized face on the wrong sized head.
Ol' smushy face,
that's what I called him.
That's real nice.
I didn't care what he looked like.
He made me laugh, and I liked being around him.
translation.zh: ‎他给我带来欢笑 我喜欢在他身边

translation.en: You want to know how you can tell if you're meant to be with someone?
translation.zh:
‎你想知道
‎怎么看两个人是不是一对儿？

translation.en: -Please. -It's simple.
Just sit and have a conversation.
Some people when you talk to them, it's like trying to listen to classical music
translation.zh:
‎跟有些人聊天
‎就像你捧着一个没有天线的收音机

translation.en: on a radio with no antenna.
You can push that dial back and forth all you want,
but you only get static.
But when you're meant to be with someone,
and they truly are the one,
you just sit,
start talking,
and a Beethoven sonata will begin to play.
You haven't mentioned the formal, Cel. It's tomorrow night.
translation.zh:
‎你没提正装舞会的事 西利亚
‎是明天晚上

translation.en: Do you get a cut of the ticket sales or something?
translation.zh: ‎你是没买到票 还是怎么了？

translation.en: -You are going, right? -I am actually.
-With whom? -Nobody.
I'm going whom-less.
What about Brooks?
I thought you guys were hanging out,
to use the parlance of your time.
Dad, no. I don't want to go with anybody.
translation.zh: ‎不 爸爸  我不想跟谁去

translation.en: Not Brooks Rattigan, not Franklin Volley, nobody.
translation.zh:
‎既不要布鲁克斯·拉蒂根
‎也不要弗兰克林·沃里

translation.en: -Okay? -Honey, listen--
No, Mom, can you listen?
translation.zh: ‎妈 别说了 能听我的吗？

translation.en: I have the rest of my life to get hung up on relationships and dating,
translation.zh:
‎我剩下的人生要经历很多
‎约会和情感生活

translation.en: and "Is he really into me?", and "What does this text mean?"
translation.zh:
‎“他喜欢我吗？”
‎ “这个信息是什么意思？”

translation.en: -And all that bullshit. -Celia.
translation.zh:
‎-这些乱七八糟的东西
‎-西利亚

translation.en: Why is high school the time of your life

translation.en: that you're expected to be good at everything?
I just wanna be whatever I am.
And I'm proud of that.
I just wanted you to have a better high school experience than I had.

-Group hug. -No, that's good.
-Group hug. -Please.
-Yep. -Oh, do we have to? Stop.
Wow.
You look incredible.

translation.en: Bioslimming active wrap, two hours of pilates,

translation.en: and like 12 pounds of moisturizer to look this way.

‎就达到了这个效果

translation.en: Wow. I took a shower.
Hold on, wait, chivalry is not dead.

translation.en: -All right. -Thank you.
You're welcome.
What's that smell?

translation.en: Yeah, it was a while ago.
So, Shelby, do you have any plans for after high school?

translation.en: I don't know, it's tough.
I don't, like, have my whole life planned out or anything.

translation.en: -Yeah, nobody does. -Exactly.
So, in the fall, I'll be going to Columbia,
where I'll major in applied economics in management with a concentration in finance,

‎主修管理应用经济学
‎我将专攻金融这一块

translation.en: and of course, I'll intern at my father's hedge fund over the summers.
translation.zh:
‎夏天
‎我会去我父亲的对冲基金公司实习

translation.en: Then, it's off to Harvard Business School, where I'll get my MBA.
I'll graduate, get some seed money
translation.zh:
‎-酷
‎-等我毕业了 我会拿一小笔资金

translation.en: and then open up my own private equity firm, but...
translation.zh: ‎开一家我自己的投资管理公司

translation.en: after that, it's all kind of up in the air.
You really have to get your shit together, huh?
Right, yeah.
Yeah.
How about you?
-Me? -Yeah.
Well, I'm applying to Yale,
and then I'll...
Well, I've been obsessing over just
applying for so long, that I haven't even thought about what I would do if I got in.
translation.zh:
‎申请大学了
‎我们还没想好入学后做什么

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
Yeah, but I'm 18.
I got time to figure out who I am and what I want to do.
translation.zh:
‎我有时间… ‎去想明白我是什么样的人
‎我想做什么

translation.en: You know what I mean?
No.
-Oh, no. -What?
It's your ex.
Is this gonna be weird for you?
translation.zh:
‎你会觉得不自在吗？
‎我自己根本不在乎

translation.en: I mean, I personally don't care at all, but maybe you should?
translation.zh:
‎你会觉得不自在吗？
‎我自己根本不在乎 ‎-但也许你应该在乎
‎-不 没关系

translation.en: No, it's fine.
translation.zh:
‎-但也许你应该在乎
‎-不 没关系

translation.en: Wow, she's a really bad dancer.
Yeah, she's the worst.
So, you wanna go get a table or... ?
-Yeah, sure. -[woman] Brooks?
It is you.
Leah, hi. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: ‎利亚 你好 你在这儿干嘛？

translation.en: I go here. Look, I just really wanted to thank you,
translation.zh: ‎我来参加舞会 我想来谢谢你

translation.en: you really helped me out a lot. If I hadn't used your services,
translation.zh:
‎你帮了我很多
‎要是我没有使用你提供的服务

translation.en: I wouldn't have been able to get with Larry, here.
-Hi, I'm Larry. -It's nice to meet you, Larry.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 我叫拉里
‎-拉里 幸会

translation.en: -Do you want to get that table? -Uh...
Wait, what do you mean, you used his services?
translation.zh:
‎等一下
‎你说你用他的服务是什么意思？

translation.en: -This table right here. -His Stand-In app, Brooks for hire.
translation.zh:
‎-那边有桌子
‎-他的替身手机应用 雇佣布鲁克斯

translation.en: Isn't that what you're doing, Shelby?
translation.zh: ‎你是不是也在使用他的服务？

translation.en: Am I... am I paying somebody to go out with me?
God, no. Gross.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 不 这太恶心了

translation.en: -Brooks? -Yeah?
What the hell is going on here?
I have a side...
business, where I go on dates with girls.
Why?
Wait.
You're not like a male prostitute or anything, right?
Like, what is it?
A male gigolo?
Well, all gigolos are males, but not all males are gigolos.
translation.zh:
‎-男性舞男
‎-舞男都是男的 ‎但不是所有男的都是舞男

translation.en: No, it's clean and innocent. I swear, it's...
translation.zh: ‎我的生意是干净无辜的 我保证…

translation.en: I do it because I need the money. Shelby, I'm not rich. I'm not from Darien.
translation.zh:
‎我这样做是因为我需要钱
‎谢尔比 我不富有 我不是来自达里恩

translation.en: I'm just some poor kid from Bridgeport, who wanted to impress you.
translation.zh:
‎我只是个来自布里奇波特的穷小子
‎想给你留下好印象

translation.en: I mean, look at you, you are smart,
and strong and beautiful, and you are way too good for me.

translation.en: You're right.
I am too good for you,
and not because I have more money than you,
it's because I'm not a liar.
Hi.
Hey.
Where is your date?
She is elsewhere.
I told her everything.
Where's Franklin?
Oh, you know, he's somewhere.
Probably making sure no-one ever wants to be an artist again.
translation.zh: ‎也许在劝说别人不要当艺术家

translation.en: -You guys didn't work out? -No.
No, we didn't. You know, he's not really my type.
translation.zh: ‎我们没成 他不是我喜欢的类型

translation.en: Turns out I'm more into oblivious,
translation.zh: ‎我发现我其实对那种当局者迷

translation.en: self-absorbed pricks, you know.
Right.
Well, then,
would you like to dance?
No.
No, I wouldn't.
Why not?
Because I'm not your backup.
You're home early.
Yeah.
Yeah.
Tonight didn't really go quite as I thought it would.
I'm sorry, kid.
-You wanna lay it on me? -[switches TV off]
I've been a stand-in.
I see.
And what do those two words mean in this context?
Well, I started a dating service app.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
I was the date,
the stand-in.
I've raised quite the entrepreneur, huh? I mean, it was more just really...
translation.zh:
‎-我把你培养成为一个创业家
‎-只是参加一些…

translation.en: school dances, and um...
art show openings. I went to a rodeo. Oh, yeah, the cowboy outfit.
translation.zh:
‎-艺术展开幕式 我去了牛仔竞技比赛
‎-哦 没错 那套牛仔行头

translation.en: -You saw that? -Sure did, pardner.
translation.zh:
‎-你看到了？
‎-当然 我们住一起

translation.en: Damn, Brooks, you did all that just to raise money for Yale?
translation.zh:
‎布鲁克斯
‎你这样做只是为了攒耶鲁的学费

translation.en: I'd have sold a non-vital organ, if I'd known it meant that much to you.
translation.zh:
‎要是我知道你这么在意
‎我会把不致命的器官给卖了

translation.en: There's a reason God gave us two kidneys.

translation.en: That spare kidney is just a rainy day cash cow, sitting there.

translation.en: It wasn't really just for the money.
I went out on all these dates

‎那些女孩想我是什么人
‎我就可以装作我是什么人 ‎我也不知道了 我以为…

translation.en: because, I don't know, I thought that...
I thought that maybe I would find out who I am, and Miss Track...

translation.en: quite cruelly pointed out that I have absolutely no idea who I am.

‎施特拉克夫人无情地指出
‎我根本不知道自己是谁

translation.en: Anyway, it didn't work.
Yeah, well who the hell knows who they are anyway.
We are all just figuring it out as we go along.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
So, the best you can do is
reflect on who you were in the past
and compare that to who you wanna be in the future,
translation.zh: ‎和你希望你未来的样子做比较

translation.en: and you split the difference. That's who you are now.

translation.en: Like, I was a success,
and I wanna be a success again.
And I was a good husband,
until your mom left us.
She left me,

‎你知道我哪方面没有失败吗？
‎我还是个好父亲…

translation.en: Because of who you turned out to be.
I know sometimes you think I gave up and...

translation.en: yeah, maybe there's some truth in that.
But I never gave up on you.
I love you, bud.
-I love you too, Dad. -I know.
-I'll be back. -Cool.
Not used to you being alone.

I have an emotional parachute that I've been weaving together,

translation.en: every day I've been alive. [chuckles]
But how goes that Yale essay?

‎-金枪鱼三明治怎么样了？

translation.en: so, good, I guess? Or, at the very least, not really bad.

So, I guess, let's both do better at what we have to do.

translation.en: Yeah.
-All right. -All right.
Watch this.
Hey, Rattigan, dude, I heard what happened with you and my cousin,

translation.en: and if it makes you feel any better,

‎-不用了
‎-我只是开玩笑的 我不会…

‎-什么？
‎-我说不用了 谢谢 里斯

‎听着 如果你想找人说说
‎你可以找我

Uh, what?
Hey, Celia.
Hey.
Thank you for saying yes to this.

Franklin was right, they're kind of divine.

‎弗兰克林说得还真不错
‎口味很好

So, how have you been?
Good.
I'm good. I'm really good.
That's good.
Well, I killed the app.
Oh, that right?
Well, in the spirit of honesty, which is kind of my new thing,

translation.en: I haven't quite been able to bring myself to delete it,

And the women of the world weep.
Not really. There's a couple of copycat apps that have popped up.

‎不至于
‎现在出现了一些模仿我的应用

‎市场越来越饱和了
‎现在是时候退出了

translation.en: -Good. -Yeah.
-It's nice to see you. I miss you. -Brooks.

‎-见到你真好 我很想你
‎-布鲁克斯

translation.en: Please, just don't, okay?
Hey, am I gonna read the admissions letter or what?

I hope you didn't waste too much time on it,

translation.en: because based on your meeting with the Dean,

‎-什么？
‎-我接受了康大提供的入学机会

translation.en: Hold on, I thought Yale was everything to you.
translation.zh:
‎等一下 我以为… ‎-耶鲁大学对你很重要
‎-以前是

translation.zh:
‎-耶鲁大学对你很重要
‎-以前是

translation.en: It was and then I realized
that if I have to pretend to be someone else to get in,
translation.zh: ‎如果我得装成另一个人才能进耶鲁

translation.en: then I probably don't belong there.
You know?
Brooks, what is this?
[Brooks] Dear Admissions Office of the University of Celia Lieberman,

translation.en: First off, I just want to say what an honor it is
just to be considered as a potential attendee at your fine institution.

translation.en: And secondly, this feels really creepy writing to you

translation.en: as if you're a university and not a person, so I'll stop that now.

‎而不把你当成一个人 这很怪异
‎所以我现在要改过来

translation.en: A few months ago, I was a guy who carried around this empty feeling.

translation.en: Then, I thought that it could be filled by
driving the nicest car,
dating the most popular girl, or going to the fanciest school.
