‎找校花做女朋友
‎上好学校来填补这种空虚

translation.en: But the closer I got to having any of these things,
the deeper that empty feeling got.
I've been so many people these past few months.
translation.zh: ‎过去的几个月 我扮演了很多人

translation.en: A cowboy, an art connoisseur, an amateur beekeeper,
translation.zh: ‎牛仔、艺术收藏家、业余养蜂人

translation.en: a prep school wannabe, a bad friend,
translation.zh:
‎一个预备学校的崇拜模仿者
‎一个差劲的朋友

translation.en: an obnoxious son and a self-obsessed prick.

translation.en: But through it all there were little pockets of air
translation.zh:
‎但在这期间
‎有一点点时间让我觉得

translation.en: when I felt like I was truly myself,
and that was when I was with you.
I don't know if you're accepting applications right now,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你现在是否接受申请

translation.en: but if not, I am totally willing to be wait-listed.
translation.zh:
‎如果不接受
‎我很愿意在你的等待名单上

translation.en: [Dad] Hey.
I was gonna cook a steak, do you want one?
-No, thanks. -Are you sure?
-Yeah, I'm good. -All right.
[Brooks] Hey...
you actually got some mail. I put it on the table.

translation.en: Oh, boy.
Just what I need. It's probably another rejection letter.

translation.en: This is...
It must be one of the grants I applied for,
translation.zh: ‎这一定是我为富有远见写作奖

translation.en: the Visionary Writing Award.
Dear Mr. Rattigan, in recognition of your unparalleled literary talent,
translation.zh:
‎”亲爱的拉蒂根先生
‎出于对你无与伦比的写作天赋的赏识

translation.en: we would like to offer you this grant to further your career as a visionary writer.
translation.zh:
‎我们向你提供这项资金 ‎帮助你在富有远见的作家的事业上
‎走得更远”

translation.en: -That's incredible, Dad. -Yeah! That's how we do it!
translation.zh:
‎-这太棒了 爸爸
‎-耶！这才像个样！

translation.en: Steak night. Boom!
I shouldn't have slapped you.
I mean, it felt great for me,
but I shouldn't have slapped you.
-No, I think I deserved it. -Yeah, you did.
translation.zh:
‎不 我想… ‎-我是自找的
‎-没错！

translation.en: And, you know, I'd do it again.
But I'd really like to not have to.
So, are you ready to go?
Go where?
Our date. I'm taking you to the formal.
translation.zh: ‎我们的约会 我要带你去正装舞会

translation.en: Another formal? How expensive are horse stables?
translation.zh:
‎又有正装舞会？
‎你们的马厩得花多少钱？

translation.en: It's just a shed over an animal.
translation.zh: ‎只是给动物遮风挡雨的地方

translation.en: No, I'm not going to another formal for as long as I live.
translation.zh: ‎我这辈子也不会去参加正装舞会了

translation.en: Come on, I'm not taking no for an answer and you know how stubborn I can be.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 你无法拒绝的
‎你知道我有多固执

translation.en: I do know that.
-Fine. -Good answer.
But wait, you left literally all the fields blank on the app, so
what kind of personality would you like for your date?
translation.zh: ‎你需要什么样性格的人和你约会？

translation.en: There were so many good ones.
But I think I'm gonna go with regular old
no-frills, vanilla ice cream Brooks Rattigan.
translation.zh:
‎无装饰的
‎香草冰激凌的布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: I think I can make that happen.
[Celia] Thanks, I got that.
-Nice of you to dress up. -Yeah.
I just... I do what she tells me to do.
[man] Hey, what's up?
Murph.
-This is incredible. -I know.
I can't take all the credit, the whole thing was Celia's idea,
translation.zh: ‎我不能居功 这都是西利亚的主意

translation.en: and tuna melt is a whiz with décor.
translation.zh: ‎金枪鱼三明治是个装饰天才

translation.en: What's his real name?
Oh, my God, you don't know.
How do you not know his name?
I keep hoping it will come up naturally and it never does.
translation.zh:
‎我希望一切顺其自然 ‎但从来没有机会
‎现在我也不能问他 我很有深度的

translation.en: And I can't ask him now, I'm in too deep.
translation.zh:
‎但从来没有机会
‎现在我也不能问他 我很有深度的

translation.en: Look, I know it's early, but if you're in need of a roommate next year...
translation.zh:
‎我知道现在提这事儿太早
‎如果明年你需要一个室友…

translation.en: No.
-Wait, you're going to UCONN? -I am.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 你被康大录取了？
‎-是的

translation.en: I didn't think they'd accept me, considering my GPA is a bit iffy,
translation.zh: ‎凭我的成绩 他们不会录取我

translation.en: but I showed them some of my apps, and they were impressed.
translation.zh:
‎但我给他们看了我的些应用
‎他们对我刮目相看

translation.en: Who told you the Stand-In would be good for both of us?
translation.zh:
‎是谁告诉你
‎替身软件会对我们俩都有好处？

translation.en: Not the Stand-In, they hated it.
-What? -They hated it.
They liked MyTraxx,
and I tweaked it to be applicable for student loans.
translation.zh:
‎我稍微调整了一下
‎这个应用可以用在申请学生贷款上

translation.en: You know, which makes me a genius.
translation.zh: ‎你知道… ‎这让我看起来像个天才

translation.en: -Congratulations, man. -Hey, Murph, help me with this table.
translation.zh:
‎-祝贺你 哥们儿
‎-嘿 墨菲 帮我搭个手

translation.en: Got it, uh...
man.
Hey, I can bear this wait no longer, you've gotta tell me.
translation.zh: ‎嘿  ‎我等不急了 你得告诉我…

translation.en: Did I get in?
It was a tough call.
I mean, your essay was littered with sentence fragments and run-ons,
translation.zh:
‎你的申请书上都是句子片段
‎和不合语法的长句子

translation.en: like, seriously, but,
